sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useEffect, useRef } from "react" const AREA_MAXIMA = 50 const CANVAS_WIDTH = 1000 const CANVAS_HEIGHT = 700 const DistributionCanvas = ({ distribucion }) => { const canvasRef = useRef(null) useEffect(() => { if (!canvasRef.current || !distribucion) return const canvas = canvasRef.current const ctx = canvas.getContext("2d") const bgGradient = ctx.createRadialGradient( CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, CANVAS_HEIGHT / 2, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, CANVAS_HEIGHT / 2, CANVAS_WIDTH * 0.7, ) bgGradient.addColorStop(0, "#ffffff") bgGradient.addColorStop(0.5, "#f8f9fa") bgGradient.addColorStop(1, "#e9ecef") ctx.fillStyle = bgGradient ctx.fillRect(0, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH, CANVAS_HEIGHT) ctx.strokeStyle = "#cbd5e0" ctx.lineWidth = 1.5 ctx.setLineDash([]) const gridSize = 50 for (let x = 0; x <= CANVAS_WIDTH; x += gridSize) { ctx.globalAlpha = x % (gridSize * 2) === 0 ? 0.4 : 0.2 ctx.beginPath() ctx.moveTo(x, 0) ctx.lineTo(x, CANVAS_HEIGHT) ctx.stroke() } for (let y = 0; y <= CANVAS_HEIGHT; y += gridSize) { ctx.globalAlpha = y % (gridSize * 2) === 0 ? 0.4 : 0.2 ctx.beginPath() ctx.moveTo(0, y) ctx.lineTo(CANVAS_WIDTH, y) ctx.stroke() } ctx.globalAlpha = 1 ctx.setLineDash([]) ctx.strokeStyle = "#2d3748" ctx.lineWidth = 6 ctx.strokeRect(0, 0, CANVAS_WIDTH, CANVAS_HEIGHT) const colores = [ { fill: "#667eea", shadow: "#4c63d2", light: "#8b9aff" }, { fill: "#12b886", shadow: "#0ca678", light: "#38d9a9" }, { fill: "#fab005", shadow: "#e09f04", light: "#fcc419" }, { fill: "#fa5252", shadow: "#e03e3e", light: "#ff6b6b" }, { fill: "#228be6", shadow: "#1c7ed6", light: "#4dabf7" }, { fill: "#be4bdb", shadow: "#ae3ec9", light: "#da77f2" }, { fill: "#20c997", shadow: "#1bb386", light: "#63e6be" }, { fill: "#fd7e14", shadow: "#e8590c", light: "#ff922b" }, { fill: "#4c6ef5", shadow: "#3b5bdb", light: "#748ffc" }, { fill: "#82c91e", shadow: "#74b816", light: "#a9e34b" }, { fill: "#15aabf", shadow: "#1098ad", light: "#3bc9db" }, { fill: "#e64980", shadow: "#d6336c", light: "#f06595" }, ] const escala = Math.sqrt((CANVAS_WIDTH * CANVAS_HEIGHT) / AREA_MAXIMA) * 0.82 let x = 30 let y = 80 let maxHeightInRow = 0 distribucion.forEach((item, index) => { const areaUnitaria = item.area const cantidad = item.cantidad const colorSet = colores[index % colores.length] for (let i = 0; i < cantidad; i++) { const lado = Math.sqrt(areaUnitaria) * escala if (x + lado > CANVAS_WIDTH - 30) { x = 30 y += maxHeightInRow + 15 maxHeightInRow = 0 } if (y + lado > CANVAS_HEIGHT - 30) { break } ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.35)" ctx.shadowBlur = 20 ctx.shadowOffsetX = 6 ctx.shadowOffsetY = 6 const radius = Math.min(lado * 0.12, 15) const internalGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(x, y, x + lado, y + lado) internalGradient.addColorStop(0, colorSet.light) internalGradient.addColorStop(0.5, colorSet.fill) internalGradient.addColorStop(1, colorSet.shadow) ctx.fillStyle = internalGradient ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x, y, lado, lado, radius) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.strokeStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.lineWidth = 5 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x, y, lado, lado, radius) ctx.stroke() const highlightGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(x, y, x, y + lado * 0.3) highlightGradient.addColorStop(0, "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4)") highlightGradient.addColorStop(1, "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)") ctx.fillStyle = highlightGradient ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x, y, lado, lado * 0.3, [radius, radius, 0, 0]) ctx.fill() if (lado > 60) { ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.font = "bold 16px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "center" ctx.textBaseline = "middle" const texto = item.nombre.length > 15 ? item.nombre.substring(0, 12) + "..." : item.nombre ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)" ctx.shadowBlur = 8 ctx.fillText(texto, x + lado / 2, y + lado / 2 - 12) ctx.font = "600 13px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.fillText(`${areaUnitaria.toFixed(2)} m²`, x + lado / 2, y + lado / 2 + 8) ctx.font = "bold 11px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.fillStyle = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)" ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(x + lado - 28, y + 8, 20, 18, 4) ctx.fill() ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.fillText(`#${i + 1}`, x + lado - 18, y + 17) ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 } else if (lado > 35) { ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.font = "bold 18px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "center" ctx.textBaseline = "middle" ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)" ctx.shadowBlur = 6 ctx.fillText(item.nombre.charAt(0), x + lado / 2, y + lado / 2) ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 } x += lado + 15 maxHeightInRow = Math.max(maxHeightInRow, lado) } }) const legendX = 30 const legendY = CANVAS_HEIGHT - 40 - distribucion.length * 36 const legendWidth = 320 ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)" ctx.shadowBlur = 25 ctx.shadowOffsetX = 0 ctx.shadowOffsetY = 8 const legendGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient( legendX - 15, legendY - 15, legendX - 15, legendY + distribucion.length * 36 + 30, ) legendGradient.addColorStop(0, "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.98)") legendGradient.addColorStop(1, "rgba(248, 249, 250, 0.95)") ctx.fillStyle = legendGradient ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(legendX - 15, legendY - 15, legendWidth, distribucion.length * 36 + 30, 15) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.strokeStyle = "#cbd5e0" ctx.lineWidth = 3 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(legendX - 15, legendY - 15, legendWidth, distribucion.length * 36 + 30, 15) ctx.stroke() distribucion.forEach((item, index) => { const colorSet = colores[index % colores.length] ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)" ctx.shadowBlur = 8 const itemGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient( legendX, legendY + index * 36, legendX + 26, legendY + index * 36 + 26, ) itemGradient.addColorStop(0, colorSet.light) itemGradient.addColorStop(0.5, colorSet.fill) itemGradient.addColorStop(1, colorSet.shadow) ctx.fillStyle = itemGradient ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(legendX, legendY + index * 36, 26, 26, 6) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.strokeStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.lineWidth = 3 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(legendX, legendY + index * 36, 26, 26, 6) ctx.stroke() ctx.fillStyle = "#212529" ctx.font = "600 14px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "left" ctx.fillText(`${item.nombre}`, legendX + 38, legendY + index * 36 + 13) const cantidadText = `× ${item.cantidad}` const cantidadWidth = ctx.measureText(cantidadText).width + 12 ctx.fillStyle = colorSet.fill ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect( legendX + 38 + ctx.measureText(item.nombre).width + 10, legendY + index * 36 + 3, cantidadWidth, 20, 10, ) ctx.fill() ctx.fillStyle = "#ffffff" ctx.font = "bold 11px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "center" ctx.fillText( cantidadText, legendX + 38 + ctx.measureText(item.nombre).width + 10 + cantidadWidth / 2, legendY + index * 36 + 13, ) }) ctx.fillStyle = "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.98)" ctx.shadowColor = "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)" ctx.shadowBlur = 20 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 - 200, 20, 400, 50, 12) ctx.fill() ctx.shadowColor = "transparent" ctx.shadowBlur = 0 ctx.strokeStyle = "#cbd5e0" ctx.lineWidth = 3 ctx.beginPath() ctx.roundRect(CANVAS_WIDTH / 2 - 200, 20, 400, 50, 12) ctx.stroke() ctx.fillStyle = "#2d3748" ctx.font = "bold 18px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.textAlign = "center" ctx.fillText("Distribución Óptima de Artículos", CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, 38) const areaTotal = distribucion.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.areaTotal, 0).toFixed(2) ctx.fillStyle = "#667eea" ctx.font = "600 13px -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', sans-serif" ctx.fillText(`Área total utilizada: ${areaTotal} m² de ${AREA_MAXIMA} m²`, CANVAS_WIDTH / 2, 56) }, [distribucion]) return (
) } export default DistributionCanvas
